item.title: Meander Sonor Ode
item.description: (a listening deeply gift from the urban inside) A speaker faced down the bench where we sat, directly adjacent to the Duet. Their aging laptops looping maybe scooping the sound from their devices, strung and hung in air plus wired, synth sound supple and rounded towards their combined long-tone sculpting. As the bench began to resonate, this pool of glacial tones clustering and extended found the grains of smooth planked architecture,
